about_the_game: In our VR boxing game, you would wear a VR headset and use motion controllers to simulate throwing punches. Once you enter the ring, you would face off against your opponent and attempt to knock them out by landing punches. The Way Of Punch uses physics-based mechanics to simulate the impact of your punches. You have to dodge and weave to avoid your opponent's attacks, and use different combinations of punches to wear them down. You will have to compete in tournaments or climb the ranks to become a champion. Overall, our VR boxing game aims to provide a realistic and immersive boxing experience, allowing you to feel like you're really in the ring and landing punches on your opponent.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a game centered around fighting an opponent.  There will be no gore or blood involved.
